---
title: Set a custom admin account for a Stellar Asset Contract (SAC)
hide_table_of_contents: true
description: Set a custom administrator account on a deployed SAC
---

The [Stellar Asset Contract (SAC)](../../../tokens/stellar-asset-contract.mdx) includes functionality to set a custom administration account on the contract itself. This can be seen as a security precaution, similar to locking an asset's issuer account after creating the total supply of tokens.

## Considerations

The effectively utilize the SAC admin functionality, you should be aware of a few things first.

- When a SAC is initially enabled for an issued asset, the `Admin` address on the contract defaults to the issuer account.
- A SAC `Admin` address can be either a "regular" `G...` address, or it can be a smart contract `C...` address. This opens up
- Changing a SAC `Admin` address (initially) requires authorization from the asset's issuer account. After the `Admin` address has been set a first time, subsequent changes will require authorization from the _current_ `Admin` address.
- If an asset's issuer account is locked while the SAC `Admin` address has not been changed, it will _never_ be possible to change the SAC `Admin` address.
- If an asset's issuer account is locked after the SAC `Admin` address has been changed, tokens will still be able to be minted from the contract as long as it's authorized by the new `Admin` address.

## Example

The following example will create a new Stellar asset, `ASTRO:GB2LTKIBEMZKQEOPVJ3T3LARYIDYH4VZYGLCEAB6GP3JXIHKJQ6NLLKC`.

## In the wild

A fun example of a project utilizing a custom administrator address on a SAC can be found with the KALE Project. The KALE issuer is `G...`, but you can see the `Admin` address for the SAC is `C...`

```text
Asset: ASTRO:GB2LTKIBEMZKQEOPVJ3T3LARYIDYH4VZYGLCEAB6GP3JXIHKJQ6NLLKC
Address: CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT

Issuer: testing123
Public: GD3TC2F6CMA35NQFUGIYMAJIF6DOWDGUKN5VOAIBWGUPZEI23PN4QQWL
Secret: SCKKFZJEIZHY3APKWFI7JWVXQFBREVCTAIPSCIMPCDQLXMRX5OTGXPNK

Recipient: testing456
Public: GA7JS7DDZBWXD6F73YZWJGZAXYBY6JNPCSUJ7JUCWHXEDEOQLI3VL6R5
Secret: SAGNC2MIP3CD4ZBSSNDVW5BL6QQAPG3OKPCZK7SKVMM2P77SFBMHYBQV

Admin: testing789
Public: GBLYGKYVCWLSFDRBXKY2L2OJ4BUHIQYHGKQKWLKPU4DQVCLYARI6EDED
Secret: SBA4E55FQEOWJJTQBJ2LCQW2YMV3JJZIX4XSV5EMGULZOXWFECAJK76L
```

```bash
stellar contract asset deploy --network testnet \
    --source testing123 \
    --asset QRST:GD3TC2F6CMA35NQFUGIYMAJIF6DOWDGUKN5VOAIBWGUPZEI23PN4QQWL \
# CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- admin
# GD3TC2F6CMA35NQFUGIYMAJIF6DOWDGUKN5VOAIBWGUPZEI23PN4QQWL

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- set_admin --new_admin GBLYGKYVCWLSFDRBXKY2L2OJ4BUHIQYHGKQKWLKPU4DQVCLYARI6EDED
# successful transaction: 3ba496d439f96ff764672ee4c56f84c2681e62efd07c869554b8f0ac12d55218

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- admin
# GBLYGKYVCWLSFDRBXKY2L2OJ4BUHIQYHGKQKWLKPU4DQVCLYARI6EDED

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- balance --id testing456
# 10000000000000000

stellar contract invoke --source testing789 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- mint --amount 100 --to testing456

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- balance --id testing456
# 10000000000000100

# send a payment op from testing123 account: 3e9bf557479fa250daf8ad6dd7f76839fdd72e9f5c128745aa06cf3410f48150

stellar contract invoke --source testing123 --network testnet \
    --id CDKEXDEDVX5OSLOQAQ3BIZM3RN7ILVSJBBI4I6ENNCIIJBKRVGB736TT \
    -- balance --id testing456
# 10000000230000100

# a payment op from testing123 can't be signed from testing789, `tx_bad_auth`
```
